Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player

Class PlayerSummary

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.PlayerSummary
public class PlayerSummary extends Object
This class implements the summary of a single player. It contains whatever the client can and needs to see in its view during the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerSummary​(Player player)
    This constructor is called once for every player, at the beginning of the starting phase.
    PlayerSummary​(Player player, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
    This constructor is called once for every player, at the beginning of the match.
    PlayerSummary​(PlayerSummary toCopy, boolean obscured)
    Copy constructor, returns a shallow copy of the PlayerSummary passed, if obscured is set to true replaces the hand leader with a set of -1

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerSummary

      public PlayerSummary​(Player player)
      This constructor is called once for every player, at the beginning of the starting phase. It initializes its Summary in an "empty everything" state.

    • PlayerSummary

      public PlayerSummary​(PlayerSummary toCopy, boolean obscured)
      Copy constructor, returns a shallow copy of the PlayerSummary passed, if obscured is set to true replaces the hand leader with a set of -1
      Parameters:
      toCopy - the player summary you want to copy
      obscured - if true hide the hand leaders

    • PlayerSummary

      public PlayerSummary​(Player player, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This constructor is called once for every player, at the beginning of the match. It initializes its Summary basing on its actual (starting) situation. (cardMap is passed only because here we need to use it!)

  • Method Details

    • updateConnectionState

      public void updateConnectionState​(boolean connected)
      This method, when called, updates the connections state of this player.
      Parameters:
      connected - the new state

    • updateMarketBuffer

      public void updateMarketBuffer​(Warehouse warehouse)
      This method, when called, updates the market buffer in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      warehouse - the warehouse

    • updateWarehouse

      public void updateWarehouse​(Warehouse warehouse)
      This method, when called, updates the warehouse in this player's summary.
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • updatePopeTiles

      public void updatePopeTiles​(List<Integer> popeTiles)
      This method, when called, updates the pope tiles' state in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      popeTiles - the pope tiles' array

    • updateDevCardSlots

      public void updateDevCardSlots​(DevCardSlots devCardSlots, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This method, when called, updates the dev card slots in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      devCardSlots - the dev card slots

    • updateHandLeaders

      public void updateHandLeaders​(List<LeaderCard> handLeaders, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This method, when called, updates the hand leaders in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      handLeaders - the hand leaders

    • updateHandLeadersDiscard

      public void updateHandLeadersDiscard​(LeaderCard handLeader, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This method, when called, updates the hand leaders in this player's summary, discarding the passed one.
      Parameters:
      handLeader - the hand leader discarded

    • updateActiveLeaders

      public boolean updateActiveLeaders​(LeaderCard activeLeader, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This method, when called, updates the active leaders in this player's summary, adding them in the list. It clears the list before re-inserting everything, to avoid duplicates.
      Parameters:
      activeLeader - the activated leader

    • updateWhiteMarbleConversions

      public void updateWhiteMarbleConversions​(PhysicalResource whiteMarbleConversion)
      This method, when called, updates the white marble conversions in this player's summary, adding the new one.
      Parameters:
      whiteMarbleConversion - the white marble conversions

    • updateDiscountMap

      public void updateDiscountMap​(DiscountMap discountMap)
      This method, when called, updates the discount map in this player's summary. It clears the list before re-inserting everything, to avoid duplicates.
      Parameters:
      discountMap - the discount map

    • updateTempDevCard

      public void updateTempDevCard​(DevelopmentCard tempDevCard, Map<String,​Card> cardMap)
      This method, when called, updates the temporary development card in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      tempDevCard - the temporary dev card

    • updateTempProduction

      public void updateTempProduction​(Production tempProduction)
      This method, when called, updates the temporary production in this player's summary.
      Parameters:
      tempProduction - the temporary production

    • updateLastUsedState

      public void updateLastUsedState​(StateName lastUsedState)
      This method, when called, updates the last used state in this player's summary, useful for disconnections in the middle of a complex operation ( such as Dev card buy, production, etc. ).
      Parameters:
      lastUsedState - the last used state
